name: Yamask
description: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.

abilities.name: Mummy
abilities.effect: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy.  multitype is unaffected.  If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.
abilities.description: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.
